reviewText: For 20.00? Heck no. Maybe if it were 5.00 or free, and even then your better off playing with a yoyo or staring at the ceiling. I thought, oh this was released in 2015 it must be better than the first one. Nope. Only thing different is different maps and locations, no better graphics, no better vehicles, and definitely not better controls. what a rip off. Worst 360 controller interface I have ever experienced, and based on that I can't imagine what just a keyboard is like. You looking for something similar to the TV show and driving around on skinny roads with death defying drops? Well look elsewhere because every road is a solid 2 lanes and you can take the whole game at the top speed without breaking a sweat. Theres even guard rales on every road!!! Get euro truck simulator if you are looking for something decent, do not get ripped off with this unless for some reason you can't get ANY other game on steam. This has the quality of a 90's era game and that is an insult to 90's era games.
